title: Facebook To Mark Fake News As Satire
teaser: The headline, Obama To Cut Costs By Packing Lunch Every Day For U.S. Populace, is a fake. To make sure you know that, Facebook is going to put the word satire in front of some links in your newsfeed.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
